snippet: How the N.R.A. crushed background checks.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Rep Gabrielle Giffords criticizes 45 senators who gave in to fear of National Rifle Assn and gun lobby and voted against background check legislation for gun purchases; warns lawmakers that if this Congress cannot make American communities safer, voters will make sure that they have a different Congress.
lead_paragraph: How the N.R.A. crushed background checks.

headline.main: A Senate in the Gun Lobby’s Grip
headline.print_headline: A Senate in the Gun Lobby’s Grip
